title: David
creator_credit: Religious Film Society and Steve Mason
brief_description: David Ellis, a 19 year old physically and mentally handicapped person, shares his relationship to everyday situations. The effect of his disability on family and personal relationships. A strongly religious film.
description: David Ellis, a 19 year old physically and mentally handicapped person, shares his relationship to everyday situations. The effect of his disability on family and personal relationships. A strongly religious film.
